description: Main source file implementing a Flutter-based Tic Tac Toe game with UI, game logic, and score persistence.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up theme and home screen.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: Main screen with mode selection, score tracking, and game board.

classes.name: ScoreSection
classes.description: Displays current scores for X, O, and draws.

classes.name: TicTacToeBoard
classes.description: Represents the game board, manages game state, user interactions, AI moves, and game results.

classes.name: _TicTacToeCell
classes.description: Widget for individual cell in the game grid.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point, runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: _onGameResult
methods.description: Updates scores based on game result.

methods.name: _resetBoard
methods.description: Resets the game board for a new round.

methods.name: _startNewGame
methods.description: Initializes or resets the game state for a new game.

methods.name: _handleTap
methods.description: Processes user tap on board cell, manages turn, and AI move if applicable.

methods.name: _findBasicAIMove
methods.description: Determines AI move with basic strategy.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board to determine if there's a winner.

methods.name: _showEndDialog
methods.description: Displays the game over dialog with result.

methods.name: _buildSymbolWidget
methods.description: Builds icon for X or O in cells.
